A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Where to start? There were amazing moments in this movie. However the editing was sloppy at best. The room that Snoke was in looked like a set from a high school play. Kylo Ren is easily the worst villain in star wars history. Luke and Chewie and Leia were there because I have no idea. The plotline of the first order chasing the rebel ship that was running out of gas was lazy. Rogue 1 was so superior to this movie it's hard to believe they are in the same shared universe. Some of the dialogue was laughable. Literally. Did I mention Kylo Ren is horrible? I mean he is so beyond stupid and whiny I kept hoping Darth Vader would show up and off him. Then we think we get Luke facing Ren and then....we don't. This had so much potential that was wasted.
